ProductInfo.Features:
Android 4.2.2 + 1.2GHZ MTK6572A Cortex-A9 Dual-core ARMv7 processor + 512MB RAM + 4GB ROM, works with 3G(WCDMA 850/2100MHz) & 2G(GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHZ) networks
5.0" large 2-point-touch capacitive touch screen + 960 x 540 pixels screen resolution, up to 1080P HD video recording for horizontal/vertical auto-switching visual enjoyment
LED flash camera supports up to 8 MP photo output & camcorder capability
Supports Google Navigation, built-in GPS navigation with A-GPS assisted WiFi + Play Store + Google Maps + FM + Bluetooth + Ebook + Email + Gmail + Messaging + Wallpapers + Calendar + Calculator + Clock + Alarm + World Clock + Camera + VPN + Tethering & Portable Hotspot
Supports APK format Android game and applications, such as Angry Birds, Tomcat and etc
ProductInfo.Name: CUBOT P9 5.0" Capacitive Touch Screen MTK6572A 2-Core Android 4.2.2 3G Smart Phone + GPS + 8MP CAM(521MB + 4GB)
